basics.name: Alexey Ivanov
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary:
I am a dedicated Frontend Developer with a proven track record of crafting robust and dynamic frontend applications using React and TypeScript. Specializing in web development, I excel in creating user-friendly interfaces, optimizing speed, and ensuring scalability for projects. My collaborative approach in agile environments consistently enables me to meet project targets and deadlines while merging UI/UX design principles seamlessly with functional code to deliver visually appealing applications.

My core competencies encompass React, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS. Renowned for my problem-solving skills, adaptability, attention to detail, and strong team player mindset, I thrive equally well in remote and distributed team settings, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.

Starting as a junior developer, I embarked on a journey of continuous learning and mastery of foundational technologies like React, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Through hands-on experience, mentorship, and a commitment to staying abreast of industry trends, I progressed to become an intermediate/senior developer, equipped with the expertise, confidence, and leadership skills to tackle complex technical challenges and mentor others.

My dedication to ongoing learning is evident in my pursuit of various courses and certifications, including those focused on Node.js, React, GraphQL, and software architecture. This commitment is further underscored by my high rankings in JavaScript, React, front-end development, HTML, and CSS assessments on LinkedIn Skill Assessments.

Passionate about leveraging technology to create impactful solutions, I am always eager to embrace new challenges and adopt emerging technologies. I am actively seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative projects and collaborate with forward-thinking teams.

Open to new opportunities! Let's collaborate on exciting projects. Reach out if you're interested in working together.

work.name: Global Relay
work.summary:
• Enhanced maintainability and scalability by implementing a new frontend architecture, reducing system errors by 20%
• Strengthened security features by developing a new password selection feature, resulting in a 30% decrease in unauthorized access attempts
• Empowered users by introducing a feature enabling the selection of stronger and more secure passwords.
• Contributed to reducing technical debt by refactoring legacy system components, resulting in a 25% increase in system performance
• Updated and improved design documentation to ensure enhanced project clarity and understanding, resulting in a 20% reduction in development time
• Addressed a substantial number of security and quality (SQ) issues throughout the past year
• Managed the successful onboarding of 5 CO-OPs through dedicated mentorship and tailored training programs

work.name: Capgemini Engineering
work.summary:
• Contributed to developing a data pipeline monitoring application by creating and improving the API functionality, resulting in a 40% improvement in data processing efficiency
• Revamped the user interface, resulting in a 40% decrease in user-reported errors, improving overall user experience during interactions with the pipelines
• Expanded the existing UI by incorporating additional pipeline parameters, leading to a 30% increase in user engagement and interaction with the pipelines
• Restructured and redeveloped the infrastructure application, transitioning from a class-based approach to functional components
• Implemented TypeScript and conducted unit testing resulting in a 30% reduction in bugs and a 20% increase in code coverage for improved code quality and reliability

work.name: Barsum Cloud Analytics
work.summary:
• Optimized cloud resource planning for leading banks, resulting in a 15% reduction in resource consumption costs within 6 months
• Led the transition from class-based to functional components, enhancing application responsiveness by 30%
• Expanded the existing User Interface (UI) by incorporating additional pipeline parameters
• Restructured and redeveloped the infrastructure application, transitioning from a class-based approach to functional components, resulting in a 25% reduction in code complexity

work.name: HTML Academy
work.summary: • Intensive program covers advanced HTML/CSS (HTML5, LESS/SASS, Gulp), and programming essentials (JavaScript ES6, React, Redux, TypeScript, object-oriented paradigm, architectural concepts, design patterns, Jest unit testing).

interests.name: Soccer
interests.description: I enjoy the teamwork and strategy involved in soccer. There's nothing like the thrill of scoring a goal after a well-executed play.

interests.name: Ice Hockey
interests.description: Ice hockey offers a fantastic blend of speed, skill, and intensity which I find exhilarating to watch and play.

interests.name: Chess
interests.description: Chess is a game of deep complexity and elegance that fascinates me. It's a relaxing way to train my logical thinking and strategy skills.

interests.name: Formula 1
interests.description: The high-speed thrill of Formula 1 racing draws me in every time. It's not just about the drivers’ skill, but also the strategy and technology behind the scenes fascinate me.
